goal.ch: 我們為甚麼會思考哲學問題？何謂哲學？何為哲學的內容、亦即甚麼是哲學所探討的對象？哲學如何探究各式各樣不同的現象與問題？本課程旨在從系統的分科方式來介紹西方哲學問題的性質與類別。
goal.en: “Why do we philosophize? What is philosophy? What are the contents, namely the objects of philosophy? How does philosophy investigate diverse phenomena and problems? This course tries to introduce the character and issues of Western Philosophy in a systematic way.“

outline.ch:
1. 課程說明；Chap.1何謂哲學？
2. Chap.3, §1-,  形上學(I)：哲學的性質、萌芽與發展
3. Chap.3, §1-,  形上學(II)：哲學的性質、萌芽與發展
4. Chap.2, §1-3, 知識論(I)：笛卡兒、萊布尼茲與理性主義
5. Chap.2, §4-5, 知識論(II)：休謨與經驗主義、康德的批判哲學
6. Chap.2, §6-,  知識論(III)：康德的批判哲學
7. Chap.3, §2-4, 心靈哲學：霍布斯、自由意志與決定論、心物問題
8. Chap.4 科學哲學：培根、孔恩、科學哲學理論
9. Chap.5, §1-3, 倫理學(I)：康德之義務論
10. Chap.5, §4-6, 倫理學(II)：效益主義、德行倫理學
11. Chap.5, §7-10,應用倫理學：醫療倫理學
12. Chap.6, §1-2, 社會哲學：彌爾與自由主義、馬克思的社會主義
13. Chap.6, §3-5, 政治哲學：盧梭與社會契約論、多元主義國家論
14. Chap.7, §1-2, 藝術哲學(I)：柏拉圖、亞里斯多德
15. Chap.7, §3-4, 藝術哲學(II)：托爾斯泰、馬庫色
16. Chap.8, §-3,  宗教哲學(I)：言談宗教之可能性、上帝存在的證明
17. Chap.8, §4-6, 宗教哲學(II)：多瑪斯與安瑟倫的上帝證明、惡的難題
18. 西方哲學典範的轉移
課程要求：課前閱讀、重構論證、準備問題、參與討論、撰寫報告
outline.en:
1. Course Description; Chap.1 What is Philosophy?
2. Chap.3 Metaphysics (I): Property, Germ and development of Philosophy
3. Chap.3 Metaphysics (II): Property, Germ and development of Philosophy
4. Chap.2, §1-3, Epistemology (I): Descartes, Leibniz, and Rationalism
5. Chap.2, §4-6, Epistemology (II): Hume and Empiricism; Kant’s Critical Philosophy
6. Chap.3, §2-4, Philosophy of Mind: Hobbes’ Materialism, Free Will and Determinism, Mind-Body Problem
7. Chap.4 Philosophy of Science: Bacon, Kuhn, Philosophy of Science
8. Chap.5, §1-3, Ethics (I): Kant’s Deontology
9. Chap.5, §4-6, Ethics (II): Utilitarianism, Virtue Ethics
10. Chap.5, §7-10, Applied Ethics: Ethics of Medicine
11. Chap.6, §1-2, Social Philosophy: Mill and Liberalism, Marx and Socialism
12. Chap.6, §3-5, Political Philosophy: Rousseau and Social contract, National Pluralism
13. Chap.7, §1-2, Philosophy of Arts (I): Plato, Aristotle
14. Chap.7, §3-4, Philosophy of Arts (II): Tolstoy、Marcuse
15. Chap.8, §1-3, Philosophy of Religion (I): Possibility of speaking of Religion, Proofs of God’s Existence
16. Chap.8, §4-6, Philosophy of Religion (II): Thomas Aquina’s and Anslem’s Proof of God’s Existence, Problem of Evil
17. Paradigm Shift of Western Philosophy
18. Writing Term Paper
Demand of Seminar: Reading Texts, Reconstructing Arguments, Preparing Questions, Engaging in Discussion, Writing Paper.
